metadata.description: Quantified tag effects for simulation pre-processing
metadata.usage: Apply these modifiers to projections/correlations BEFORE sim engine

effect_types.correlation_boost_qb: Add to base QB correlation coefficient
effect_types.correlation_boost_opp_qb: Add to opposing QB correlation (game stacks)
effect_types.ceiling_penalty_pct: Reduce ceiling percentile by this factor
effect_types.floor_boost_pct: Increase floor percentile by this factor
